alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 7:09PM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains
